Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can identify and illustrate two different habitats, one land habitat and one water habitat.
The student can draw a variety of living things (plants and animals) that are found in the land habitat.
The student can draw a variety of living things (plants and animals) that are found in the water habitat.
The student can compare by illustrating the differences in the types of living things found between the two habitats.
The student can show patterns by representing a diversity of life present in each habitat.
